item.title: A Savory Way to Approach Your New Year's Resolutions This Year
item.description: The Fresh Start Effect is in full steam. More than a dozen people have asked me what my resolutions for 2019 are.

item.title: Motivation is what gets you started, Habit is what keeps you going - Jim Rohn [quote]
item.description: "Motivation is what gets you started, Habit is what keeps you going" - Jim Rohn
